name: Painting work
instruction:
It takes 30 ounces of paint to paint one square foot of wall.
A painter can paint 15 square feet of wall in one hour.

Write a function `paintingJob` that takes parameters:
`length` - length of wall in feet
`width` - width of the wall in feet

The function should return a string of the form: `Time: 6.666666666666667. Paint: 3000. Area: 100. Enjoy!

`Time, h` - the time it takes to paint the wall in hours

`Paint` - the amount of paint that will be needed to paint the wall in ounces

`Area` - the area of the wall in square feet


* Calculate the total area of the wall in square feet.
* Calculate the amount of paint required to paint the wall in ounces by multiplying the wall area by 30.
* Divide the wall area by 15 to calculate the time it will take to paint the wall.

Example:
```javascript
Painting(10, 10); // Time: 6.666666666666667. Paint: 3000. Area: 100. Enjoy!

// area 10 * 10 = 100
// paintNeeded 100 * 30 = 3000
// time 100 / 15 = 6.666666666666667

// result: Time: 6.666666666666667. Paint: 3000. Area: 100. Enjoy!

```
